t: Baseus Portable Chargers Recalled Due to Fire Hazard; Sold on Amazon.com by Shenzhen Baseus Technology | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using the recalled portable chargers and contact Baseus to receive a free replacement charger.
